front.title: YANG Modules for the Port Control Protocol (PCP)

abstract.t: This document defines YANG modules for the Port Control Protocol (PCP), including PCP client, PCP server, PCP proxy, and Universal Plug and Play (UPnP) Internet Gateway Device - Port Control Protocol Interworking Function. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Please update this statement with the RFC number to be assigned to this document: "This version of this YANG module is part of RFC XXXX;"
